TopicTitle: My very first YouTube video: A large scale mission to the Joolian System :D

Articles.Content:
This is my very first video so forgive my noobishness, but I've wanted to do this for a long time (and by long I mean I started this mission in 0.21 and ended it in .235 hehe)

A fleet of 8 ships all in all containing a space station, a planetary base, a rover, a SSTO shuttle for Laythe, fuel reserves a Science ship and a LOT of science instruments!

The eponymous ship download (as well as several of my other creations) can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51494-The-Agamemnon-%28Exoplanetary-Outpost-Deployment-System%29-D?p=674546#post674546

I hope you guys and gals enjoy this
Welcome to the tubes! May your missions be succesfull and your failures epic.
I have a couple of criticisms. Firstly, I'm just messing with you. This is one of the most awesome things I've ever seen. You have a computer of the gods as well. Awesome mission. Please do more!
In KSP failures are always epic and thanks for the positive comments
